body:
## What happened

Tried to open Flutter Outline. Would not open.

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2019.2.3` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 40.2.4` • Dart plugin `192.6817.14`

Flutter 1.10.11-pre.198 • channel master • git@github.com:kenzieschmoll/flutter.git
Framework • revision 1982a5c3ec (6 days ago) • 2019-10-17 19:47:16 -0700
Engine • revision 508146f0de
Tools • Dart 2.6.0 (build 2.6.0-dev.8.0 f020ce5d23)

## Exception

update failed for ActionGroup: Hide (Hide active tool window)[Hide]


comment_data.body:
That's odd: `window with id="Flutter Outline" is unknown`. Everything's up to date?

If it repros, you may need to run the invalidate caches (from the File menu).
Everything is up to date. Strange that this happened, but invalidate caches fixed it.

title: Flutter Outline unable to open.
